sqlMap.select: select * from notice_article order by noar_date desc
sqlMap.insert: insert into notice_article(noar_seq, noar_subject, noar_content, noar_id) values(noar_seq.nextval, #noar_subject#, #noar_content#, #noar_id#)
sqlMap.update: update notice_article set noar_subject=#noar_subject#, noar_content=#noar_content# where noar_seq=#noar_seq#
sqlMap.select: select * from notice_article where noar_id like '%'||#noar_id#||'%' order by noar_date desc
select count(*) from notice_article where noar_id like '%'||#noar_id#||'%'
sqlMap.update: update notice_article set noar_cnt=(select noar_cnt from notice_article where noar_seq=#noar_seq#)+1 where noar_seq=#noar_seq#
